Veg Hakka Noodles : Healthy Breakfast: Indo- Chinese recipeÂ  Servings: 2 Duration: 20 mins Noodles ğŸÂ is one of the most favorite and delicious indo- Chinese recipe to anyone which can be made out of rice / wheat/ all purpose flour. My suggestion is to use wheat flour noodles for healthy breakfast noodles. Noodles can be prepare in different varieties such as Veg Hakka Noodles, Veg Schezwan Noodles, Gobi Noodles, snacks etc., it varies from one to another and completely depends on cuisine. Today I prepared Quick and tasty healthy noodles overloaded with veggies, sauce's, salt & pepper. In most of my recipes I added lots of veggies because I like healthy breakfast that's why I'm using wheat flour noodles. Nutrition facts of Veggies: Cauliflower:Â It contains vitamin C & B6 Cabbage : It contains vitaminÂ C and alsoÂ Potassium Yellow Bell Pepper: It contains vitaminsÂ A, C & B6 and alsoÂ Calcium, protein, potassium, Iron & magnesium Beans: It contains vitamins A, C & B6 and also calcium, protein, potassium, Iron & magnesium Carrot: It contains vitaminsÂ A, C & B6 and also calcium, iron, magnesium & potassium Let's start with Ingredients and follows Procedure Ingredients: Spaghetti noodles/ Wheat. Noodles : 150 gms Salt - 1 tsp Pepper - 1 tsp Oil - 2 tb sp Veggies: Cauliflower - florets - 1/2 cup Cabbage - sliced - 1/2 cup Thin Beans - fresh - chopped - 1/2 cup Carrot - sliced - 1/2 cup Yellow Bell pepper - Diced - 1/2 cup Sauces: Tomato sauce - 1/2 tb sp Green chilli Sauce - 1 tsp Red chilly sauce - 1 tsp Soya sauce - 1 tsp Vinegar - 1 tsp Procedure: Pre-preparation: How to cook perfect noodles?
  • 1 cup = 3 cups water
  • Boil water in a pan with pinch of salt over medium heat
  • When water started boiling add noodles in it
  • Once Stir & close with lid
  • Cook 5 to 8 mins in low to medium heat
  • Turnoff Cooktop/ Burner
  • Drain water by using stainer
  • Let them become cool for 15 mins
  • Mean while start preparation for noodles
[caption id="attachment_5937" align="alignnone" width="1462"] Cooked noodles ğŸ[/caption] Veg Hakka Noodles ğŸ:
  • Heat skillet pan over medium heat
  • Add oil, veggies & mix well
  • Saute 5 mins
  • Add sauce's & mix well
  • Saute 2 mins and add salt & pepper
  • Mix well
  • Add cooked noodles
  • Saute/ toss gently & mix well
  • Cook 2 mins
  • Veg Hakka Noodles ğŸÂ is ready to serve
  • Have it either at Breakfast/ Dinner. Kids surely enjoy noodles ğŸ˜€
  • Enjoy your day & Happy Cooking ğŸ˜Š
[caption id="attachment_5931" align="alignnone" width="1020"] Veg Hakka Noodles ğŸ[/caption] Note:
  • If you can't find wheat noodles Â use any kind of noodles it tastes perfect ğŸ‘Œ
  • Most important I used yellow bell pepper, why is it because it contains high amounts of vitamin C than other bell peppers. If available use, yellow bell pepper ğŸ˜€
  • People who don't like sauces, you can easily avoid them it's most healthy option instead of them you can use homemade tomato sauce, salt & pepper. It will be more delicious and healthy too ğŸ˜‹
  • Don't fry veggies they must be half cooked for crunchiness
